oai_dc:dc.dc:title: [Thomas S. Snapp] tintype
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tintype of a young uniformed soldier. This is believed to be Pvt. Thomas S. Snapp, Co. H, 5th Tenn. (McKenzie's) Cav. Regt., CSA. Snapp was born in Greene County, Tenn., in 1843. He was married to Susannah Josephine Stephens. Snapp died on; December 10, 1916, and is buried in Zion Presbyterian Church Cemetery in Greeneville, Tenn. The image could be a picture of his brother-in-law, Isaac D. Stephens. (See chat002 for Stephens.)
